meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Bind</kanji> a <kanji>bundle</kanji> of sticks to a person as a type of <vocabulary>restraint</vocabulary>. They can't get away when they're tied to a bunch of sticks, can they?
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
